Package diffusion
[transport]

Module orchestrating the diffusion scheme. The main routine in the module is diffuse(). Explicit and implicit diffusion operators are included here. More...


Functions/Subroutines

subroutine diffuse (conc, conc_prev, mass, mass_prev, area, area_prev, area_lo, area_hi, ks_lo, ks_hi, ncell, nvar, time, theta_stm, dt, dx, end_flx_bc_prev, strt_flx_bc_prev, explicit_diffusion_term)
 Calculates the diffusive portion of the constituent transport. It contains an explicit version of the diffusion operator and a general (involving all potential cases) diffusion operator as well, with a coefficient theta_stm for selecting the level of implicitness. (theta_stm=0.5 is Crank Nicolson.). The matrix is solved via a tri-diagonal solver.
subroutine explicit_diffusion_operator (explicit_diffuse_op, conc, conc_prev, mass, mass_prev, area, area_lo, area_hi, ks_lo, ks_hi, ncell, nvar, time, start_flux_bc_prev, end_flx_bc_prev, dt, dx)
 Calculate the explicit diffusion term.

Detailed Description

Module orchestrating the diffusion scheme. The main routine in the module is diffuse(). Explicit and implicit diffusion operators are included here.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine diffusion.diffuse ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  mass,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  mass_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  area_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  ks_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  ks_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  theta_stm,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  end_flx_bc_prev,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  strt_flx_bc_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  explicit_diffusion_term 
)

Calculates the diffusive portion of the constituent transport. It contains an explicit version of the diffusion operator and a general (involving all potential cases) diffusion operator as well, with a coefficient theta_stm for selecting the level of implicitness. (theta_stm=0.5 is Crank Nicolson.). The matrix is solved via a tri-diagonal solver.

Parameters:
conc Concentration at new time
conc_prev Concentration at old time
mass mass (A*C) at new time
mass_prev mass (A*C) at old time
area Cell-centered area at new time
area_prev Cell-centered area at old time
area_lo Low side area centered intime
area_hi High side area centered in time
ks_lo Low side sediment dispersion coef. centered in time
ks_hi High side sediment dispersion coef. centered in time
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time Current time
theta_stm Expilicitness coefficient 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
dt Time step
dx Spacial step
end_flx_bc_prev flux at right hand side old time
strt_flx_bc_prev flux at left hand side old time
explicit_diffusion_term Explicit diffusion predictor

)

Calculate the explicit diffusion term.

Parameters:
conc Concentration at new time
conc_prev Concentration at old time
mass mass at new time
mass_prev mass at old time
area Cell-centered area at new time
area_lo Low side area at old time
area_hi High side area
ks_lo Low side sediment dispersion coef. at old time
